Package org.jungrapht.visualization.spatial

Interface Spatial<T>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    LayoutStateChange.Listener
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractSpatial, Spatial.NoOp, Spatial.NoOp.Edge, Spatial.NoOp.Vertex, SpatialGrid, SpatialQuadTree, SpatialRTree, SpatialRTree.Edges, SpatialRTree.Vertices
    public interface Spatial<T>
extends LayoutStateChange.Listener
    Basic interface for Spatial data
    Author:
    Tom Nelson

        Parameters:

      • getContainingLeaf

        TreeNode getContainingLeaf​(Object element)
        Parameters:
        element - element to search for
        Returns:
